data.author: Steveway

changelog.release_notes:
- Last update for Aplite Pebbles
- Big improvements to stability and loading times
- Rotation in 90 degree steps
- Change to Clay for configuration (donate to support development)
- AppGlance support (refresh is kinda broken in the Diorite Emulator, don't know, don't care yet.)
- Pretty much fixed startup behavior
- Kinda fixed startup in a first hacky way

- stepcount from Pebble Health
- new Twitch status visualization

- new battery icon
- slightly improved start-up behavior

-More fixes for Timeline
-Improved loading behavior

- a few improvements for Pebble Time
- further improvements to the timeline feature (might still not work correctly)

-Added Timeline Support since Pebble changed their minds about Watchfaces
-Renamed to ShowTime, The App version is simply ShowTimeApp
-Some more minor fixes
-Improved visibility of battery Icon for color Pebbles
-Fontcolor now adjusts semi-smart
-Fontcolor now slightly adjusts to background
-Color Pebbles can now set the background color
-Choosing another color than black in the config inverts the Watchface on Aplite

-Prepared some more Color Features
-Settings Page now remembers settings
-Added first support for Pebble Time
-Possibly increased battery life.
- quite a few javascript fixes, it should now run more reliable, especially for first time users

- very small changes to make the javascript more stable
- removed most debug-messages, that should improve a few things
- missing Twitter-text on bad internet connections should be gone now

- default Twitter image added
- more "improvements" to the javascript part

data.description:
If you want to stay informed about your favorite Twitch Show then this is the app for you. You can choose a Twitch show and a Twitter account of which you want to know the current status. You can also set the timezone of your show, so that you always know what time it is for you favorite streamer. The update-period can also be customized.
You can also subscribe to get live updates on your Timeline.
